english.segment1: We go back and forth. Just looking for a life line. Nothing more than hours. Just waiting for a phone call
english.segment2: These are the nights. When nothing's gonna break me more. Just please come soon. This afternoon
english.segment3: All we want. Is our own to be here. For a life time. But you can't expect the whole world
english.segment4: These are the nights. When nothing's gonna break me more. Jesus please come soon. This afternoon
